Resistance.help: The Protector Bot is resistant to Sleep, Fear, and Disorient. They are also resistant to Lethal, Cold, and Psionic damage. It has a Laser Burst and can cast Force Shields on allies.
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Disorient, Lethal, Cold, Psionic

Laser_Burst.help: Fires a Heavy laser. Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

Force_Shield.help: You have been given a Force Shield. Your Defense to attacks is increased.
Force_Shield.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from all attacks with a {PowerName}.

Heavy_Laser_Burst.help: This Heavy Leaser Burst takes more energy to fire, but causes much more damage than a standard blast and can send your foes flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Repair.help: Repairs one Robot Henchmen. This power only works on your Robot Henchmen. Recharge: Slow

Equip.help: This Protector Bot has been Equipped. It can now Fire a Heavy Laser Burst and can Repair other Robots.

Photon_Grenade.help: The Photon Grenade has Disoriented you.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Seeker_Drones.help: You creates two Seeker Drones. These Seeker Drones will follow you until they detect an enemy and then they will zero in on their targets and detonate on impact. The small explosive flash of energy does only minor damage, but the concussion can weaken foes. Affected targets will have reduced Damage, Accuracy and Perception and may even be Disoriented for a short while. You can only ever have Two Seeker Drones out at one time and they can be destroyed by your foes. Recharge: Long
Seeker_Drones.shortHelp: Summon Seekers: Ranged Disorient, -DMG, -ACC, -Perception, Low DMG(Energy)

Upgrade.help: This Protector Bot has been Upgraded. It can now fire a Photon Grenade and create Seeker Drones.
